title: Aleksei Petrushin
text:
Aleksei Alekseyevich Petrushin (; born 29 January 1952) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
Playing career.
He made his professional debut as a player in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1969 for <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Lyubertsy">FC Torpedo Lyubertsy</a>.
Coaching career.
On 5 February 2017, Petrushin was appointed as manager of <a href="FC%20Ordabasy">FC Ordabasy</a>.
